entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.7°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
